articles.description: After a miserable season, which saw the Toffees survive in the top flight by the skin of their teeth, owner Farhad Moshiri has written to supporters to apologise and admit to wasting a pile of cash.
articles.content:
Everton owner Farhad Moshiri is like a man who has woken from the mother of all benders and is now counting the cost of his excess.
After a miserable season, which saw the Toffees survive in the top… [+9681 chars]

articles.author: Matthew Lodge, Chris Matthews
articles.title: Father and son are killed horrific 100mph-plus Isle of Man TT crash, bringing death toll to five - Daily Mail
articles.description: Roger, 46, and Bradley Stockton, 21, (pictured) from Crewe, Cheshire, died on June 10 after their sidecar crashed on the second and final lap of the race at the famous Ago's Leap.
articles.content:
A father and son race team have been killed in a horrific 100mph-plus crash at the Isle of Man TT, bringing this year's tragic death toll to five. 
Roger and Bradley Stockton, from Crewe in Cheshire… [+5792 chars]
